text: @realDonaldTrump @GoyaFoods And this is what you should be tweeting about as the nation is dying of Coronavirus! Great job WORST INEPT PRESIDENT EVER! BTW, did you enjoy your waste of our taxpayers money trip to Florida as my hospital fills up & we have a LACK OF PPE?
